description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

You can take an unexpected or socially unacceptable action with such total confidence and lack of doubt that the target canâ€™t immediately react to it. You can make an Intimidate check to demoralize a foe, but rather than cause them to be @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{Shaken} on a successful check, you cause them to be @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.aAQ6SW6iK0EVq8Ce]{Staggered} for 1 round plus 1 additional round for every 5 by which your result exceeds the DC. Once you have used this ability against a specific target, you cannot target them with it again for 24 hours.
